section.title: Performance scenario definition
section.para: Scenario is a receipt for telling PerfCake what to do. You can specify how PerfCake would generate load by configuring a generator, where and what to send by defining a sender and messages. To get any measured results such as an average throughput or a memory usage you can use reporting capabilities. To check that the responses are correct a validation is available for you to set in the scenario. There is also a possibility to specify scenario meta-data by setting the scenario's properties.
